mc_user_reviews.text: This is one of Richard Dreyfuss' and Nia Vardalos' best movies. It's a great movie for those of you who love Greek food or of all the places you've been in the world,you've never made it to Greece.

Anyone who has ever been on a tour through Europe would really appreciate this movie, despite some of it's short comings. Pretty accurate portrayal.  Negativity from the critics is way overdone and clearly based on their personal beliefs/politics and not the merits of the move.
